text: Machanupa asi Tengban Mapugi matik mangalgi arangba aduni amadi Tengban Mapu mahakmakki chap chaba saktamni, Ibungo mahakki panggalaba waheina pot pumnamakpu kaidana thambiri. Mioiba pumnamakki pap kokpinanaba thoudang pangthoklaba matungda Khwaidagi Panggallaba Tengban Mapu mahakki yetthangbada phamle.
